                  <span class="description">Never be notified.</span>

                    <span class="octicon octicon-mute"></span>
                    Stop ignoring
                  </span>
                </div>

<div class="js-clone-url clone-url "
  data-protocol-type="ssh">
  <h3><span class="text-emphasized">SSH</span> clone URL</h3>
  <div class="input-group js-zeroclipboard-container">
    <input type="text" class="input-mini input-monospace js-url-field js-zeroclipboard-target"
           value="git@git.autodesk.com:t-nguym/DynamoPro.git" readonly="readonly" aria-label="SSH clone URL">
    <span class="input-group-button">
      <button aria-label="Copy to clipboard" class="js-zeroclipboard btn btn-sm zeroclipboard-button tooltipped tooltipped-s" data-copied-hint="Copied!" type="button"><span class="octicon octicon-clippy"></span></button>
    </span>
  </div>
</div>

  
<div class="js-clone-url clone-url "
  data-protocol-type="subversion">
  <h3><span class="text-emphasized">Subversion</span> checkout URL</h3>
  <div class="input-group js-zeroclipboard-container">
    <input type="text" class="input-mini input-monospace js-url-field js-zeroclipboard-target"
           value="https://git.autodesk.com/t-nguym/DynamoPro" readonly="readonly" aria-label="Subversion checkout URL">
    <span class="input-group-button">
      <button aria-label="Copy to clipboard" class="js-zeroclipboard btn btn-sm zeroclipboard-button tooltipped tooltipped-s" data-copied-hint="Copied!" type="button"><span class="octicon octicon-clippy"></span></button>
    </span>
  </div>
</div>



  <div class="clone-options">You can clone with
    <!-- </textarea> --><!-- '"` --><form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/users/set_protocol?protocol_selector=http&amp;protocol_type=clone" class="inline-form js-clone-selector-form is-enabled" data-form-nonce="7473c9c4f6d82ae96141663cfbc1067f3e542646" data-remote="true" method="post"><div style="margin:0;padding:0;display:inline"><input name="utf8" type="hidden" value="&#x2713;" /><input name="authenticity_token" type="hidden" value="AXYd+2uU6E8ojwfucx9dEGF5xqTM/5f425uZ8EYqttc9vuLKDJhW9KE31rw2kXumKQlqWgSMEv1PQMFhxmpEtA==" /></div><button class="btn-link js-clone-selector" data-protocol="http" type="submit">HTTPS</button></form>, <!-- </textarea> --><!-- '"` --><form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/users/set_protocol?protocol_selector=ssh&amp;protocol_type=clone" class="inline-form js-clone-selector-form is-enabled" data-form-nonce="7473c9c4f6d82ae96141663cfbc1067f3e542646" data-remote="true" method="post"><div style="margin:0;padding:0;display:inline"><input name="utf8" type="hidden" value="&#x2713;" /><input name="authenticity_token" type="hidden" value="eBfQhDNgZbquqcN9GZCQmHE3zOTcBIiSDQVllxhV98Jqn70gArB//mOiMp8hQujP5SI5/ytLb7xopi1qDYXRQQ==" /></div><button class="btn-link js-clone-selector" data-protocol="ssh" type="submit">SSH</button></form>, or <!-- </textarea> --><!-- '"` --><form accept-charset="UTF-8" action="/users/set_protocol?protocol_selector=subversion&amp;protocol_type=clone" class="inline-form js-clone-selector-form is-enabled" data-form-nonce="7473c9c4f6d82ae96141663cfbc1067f3e542646" data-remote="true" method="post"><div style="margin:0;padding:0;display:inline"><input name="utf8" type="hidden" value="&#x2713;" /><input name="authenticity_token" type="hidden" value="/UR4ZPcJGFFY7Q1KiHaDMnkeFWFzf/kggO7UWPHTDwMgq9c2TJVyjglmyWd7eOVUIQ3O0vIn85+whQDpgB3ulQ==" /></div><button class="btn-link js-clone-selector" data-protocol="subversion" type="submit">Subversion</button></form>.

      <span class="octicon octicon-question"></span>

    title="master"

  <div class="blob-wrapper data type-text">
      <table class="highlight tab-size js-file-line-container" data-tab-size="8">
      <tr>
        <td id="L1" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1"></td>
        <td id="LC1" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                  GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2"></td>
        <td id="LC2" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                       Version 2.1, February 1999</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3"></td>
        <td id="LC3" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4"></td>
        <td id="LC4" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> Copyright (C) 1991, 1999 Free Software Foundation, Inc.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5"></td>
        <td id="LC5" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6"></td>
        <td id="LC6" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> Everyone is permitted to copy and distribute verbatim copies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7"></td>
        <td id="LC7" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> of this license document, but changing it is not allowed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8"></td>
        <td id="LC8" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9"></td>
        <td id="LC9" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">[This is the first released version of the Lesser GPL.  It also counts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10"></td>
        <td id="LC10" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> as the successor of the GNU Library Public License, version 2, hence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11"></td>
        <td id="LC11" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> the version number 2.1.]</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12"></td>
        <td id="LC12" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13"></td>
        <td id="LC13" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                            Preamble</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14"></td>
        <td id="LC14" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15"></td>
        <td id="LC15" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  The licenses for most software are designed to take away your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16"></td>
        <td id="LC16" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freedom to share and change it.  By contrast, the GNU General Public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L17" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="17"></td>
        <td id="LC17" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Licenses are intended to guarantee your freedom to share and change</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L18" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="18"></td>
        <td id="LC18" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">free software--to make sure the software is free for all its users.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L19" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="19"></td>
        <td id="LC19" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L20" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="20"></td>
        <td id="LC20" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  This license, the Lesser General Public License, applies to some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L21" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="21"></td>
        <td id="LC21" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">specially designated software packages--typically libraries--of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L22" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="22"></td>
        <td id="LC22" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Free Software Foundation and other authors who decide to use it.  You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L23" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="23"></td>
        <td id="LC23" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can use it too, but we suggest you first think carefully about whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L24" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="24"></td>
        <td id="LC24" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this license or the ordinary General Public License is the better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L25" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="25"></td>
        <td id="LC25" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strategy to use in any particular case, based on the explanations below.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L26" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="26"></td>
        <td id="LC26" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L27" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="27"></td>
        <td id="LC27" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  When we speak of free software, we are referring to freedom of use,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L28" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="28"></td>
        <td id="LC28" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not price.  Our General Public Licenses are designed to make sure that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L29" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="29"></td>
        <td id="LC29" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you have the freedom to distribute copies of free software (and charge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L30" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="30"></td>
        <td id="LC30" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for this service if you wish); that you receive source code or can get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L31" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="31"></td>
        <td id="LC31" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it if you want it; that you can change the software and use pieces of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L32" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="32"></td>
        <td id="LC32" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it in new free programs; and that you are informed that you can do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L33" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="33"></td>
        <td id="LC33" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L34" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="34"></td>
        <td id="LC34" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L35" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="35"></td>
        <td id="LC35" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  To protect your rights, we need to make restrictions that forbid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L36" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="36"></td>
        <td id="LC36" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distributors to deny you these rights or to ask you to surrender these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L37" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="37"></td>
        <td id="LC37" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rights.  These restrictions translate to certain responsibilities for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L38" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="38"></td>
        <td id="LC38" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you if you distribute copies of the library or if you modify it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L39" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="39"></td>
        <td id="LC39" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L40" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="40"></td>
        <td id="LC40" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  For example, if you distribute copies of the library, whether gratis</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L41" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="41"></td>
        <td id="LC41" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or for a fee, you must give the recipients all the rights that we gave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L42" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="42"></td>
        <td id="LC42" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you.  You must make sure that they, too, receive or can get the source</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L43" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="43"></td>
        <td id="LC43" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">code.  If you link other code with the library, you must provide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L44" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="44"></td>
        <td id="LC44" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complete object files to the recipients, so that they can relink them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L45" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="45"></td>
        <td id="LC45" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the library after making changes to the library and recompiling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L46" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="46"></td>
        <td id="LC46" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.  And you must show them these terms so they know their rights.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L47" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="47"></td>
        <td id="LC47" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L48" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="48"></td>
        <td id="LC48" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  We protect your rights with a two-step method: (1) we copyright the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L49" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="49"></td>
        <td id="LC49" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library, and (2) we offer you this license, which gives you legal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L50" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="50"></td>
        <td id="LC50" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">permission to copy, distribute and/or modify the library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L51" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="51"></td>
        <td id="LC51" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L52" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="52"></td>
        <td id="LC52" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  To protect each distributor, we want to make it very clear that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L53" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="53"></td>
        <td id="LC53" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is no warranty for the free library.  Also, if the library is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L54" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="54"></td>
        <td id="LC54" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">modified by someone else and passed on, the recipients should know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L55" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="55"></td>
        <td id="LC55" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that what they have is not the original version, so that the original</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L56" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="56"></td>
        <td id="LC56" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">author&#39;s reputation will not be affected by problems that might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L57" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="57"></td>
        <td id="LC57" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">introduced by others.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L58" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="58"></td>
        <td id="LC58" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L59" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="59"></td>
        <td id="LC59" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Finally, software patents pose a constant threat to the existence of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L60" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="60"></td>
        <td id="LC60" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any free program.  We wish to make sure that a company cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L61" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="61"></td>
        <td id="LC61" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effectively restrict the users of a free program by obtaining a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L62" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="62"></td>
        <td id="LC62" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restrictive license from a patent holder.  Therefore, we insist that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L63" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="63"></td>
        <td id="LC63" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any patent license obtained for a version of the library must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L64" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="64"></td>
        <td id="LC64" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consistent with the full freedom of use specified in this license.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L65" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="65"></td>
        <td id="LC65" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L66" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="66"></td>
        <td id="LC66" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Most GNU software, including some libraries, is covered by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L67" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="67"></td>
        <td id="LC67" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordinary GNU General Public License.  This license, the GNU Lesser</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L68" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="68"></td>
        <td id="LC68" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">General Public License, applies to certain designated libraries, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L69" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="69"></td>
        <td id="LC69" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is quite different from the ordinary General Public License.  We use</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L70" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="70"></td>
        <td id="LC70" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this license for certain libraries in order to permit linking those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L71" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="71"></td>
        <td id="LC71" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">libraries into non-free programs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L72" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="72"></td>
        <td id="LC72" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L73" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="73"></td>
        <td id="LC73" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  When a program is linked with a library, whether statically or using</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L74" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="74"></td>
        <td id="LC74" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a shared library, the combination of the two is legally speaking a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L75" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="75"></td>
        <td id="LC75" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combined work, a derivative of the original library.  The ordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L76" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="76"></td>
        <td id="LC76" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">General Public License therefore permits such linking only if the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L77" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="77"></td>
        <td id="LC77" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entire combination fits its criteria of freedom.  The Lesser General</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L78" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="78"></td>
        <td id="LC78" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Public License permits more lax criteria for linking other code with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L79" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="79"></td>
        <td id="LC79" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L80" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="80"></td>
        <td id="LC80" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L81" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="81"></td>
        <td id="LC81" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  We call this license the &quot;Lesser&quot; General Public License because it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L82" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="82"></td>
        <td id="LC82" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">does Less to protect the user&#39;s freedom than the ordinary General</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L83" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="83"></td>
        <td id="LC83" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Public License.  It also provides other free software developers Less</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L84" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="84"></td>
        <td id="LC84" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of an advantage over competing non-free programs.  These disadvantages</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L85" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="85"></td>
        <td id="LC85" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are the reason we use the ordinary General Public License for many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L86" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="86"></td>
        <td id="LC86" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">libraries.  However, the Lesser license provides advantages in certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L87" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="87"></td>
        <td id="LC87" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">special circumstances.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L88" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="88"></td>
        <td id="LC88" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L89" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="89"></td>
        <td id="LC89" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  For example, on rare occasions, there may be a special need to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L90" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="90"></td>
        <td id="LC90" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">encourage the widest possible use of a certain library, so that it becomes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L91" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="91"></td>
        <td id="LC91" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a de-facto standard.  To achieve this, non-free programs must be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L92" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="92"></td>
        <td id="LC92" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowed to use the library.  A more frequent case is that a free</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L93" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="93"></td>
        <td id="LC93" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library does the same job as widely used non-free libraries.  In this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L94" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="94"></td>
        <td id="LC94" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">case, there is little to gain by limiting the free library to free</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L95" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="95"></td>
        <td id="LC95" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">software only, so we use the Lesser General Public License.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L96" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="96"></td>
        <td id="LC96" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L97" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="97"></td>
        <td id="LC97" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  In other cases, permission to use a particular library in non-free</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L98" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="98"></td>
        <td id="LC98" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">programs enables a greater number of people to use a large body of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L99" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="99"></td>
        <td id="LC99" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">free software.  For example, permission to use the GNU C Library in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="100"></td>
        <td id="LC100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">non-free programs enables many more people to use the whole GNU</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="101"></td>
        <td id="LC101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">operating system, as well as its variant, the GNU/Linux operating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="102"></td>
        <td id="LC102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">system.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="103"></td>
        <td id="LC103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="104"></td>
        <td id="LC104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Although the Lesser General Public License is Less protective of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="105"></td>
        <td id="LC105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">users&#39; freedom, it does ensure that the user of a program that is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="106"></td>
        <td id="LC106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linked with the Library has the freedom and the wherewithal to run</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="107"></td>
        <td id="LC107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that program using a modified version of the Library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="108"></td>
        <td id="LC108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="109"></td>
        <td id="LC109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  The precise terms and conditions for copying, distribution and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="110"></td>
        <td id="LC110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">modification follow.  Pay close attention to the difference between a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="111"></td>
        <td id="LC111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;work based on the library&quot; and a &quot;work that uses the library&quot;.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="112"></td>
        <td id="LC112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">former contains code derived from the library, whereas the latter must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="113"></td>
        <td id="LC113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be combined with the library in order to run.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="114"></td>
        <td id="LC114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="115"></td>
        <td id="LC115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">                  GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="116"></td>
        <td id="LC116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">   TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR COPYING, DISTRIBUTION AND MODIFICATION</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="117"></td>
        <td id="LC117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="118"></td>
        <td id="LC118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  0. This License Agreement applies to any software library or other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="119"></td>
        <td id="LC119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">program which contains a notice placed by the copyright holder or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="120"></td>
        <td id="LC120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other authorized party saying it may be distributed under the terms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="121"></td>
        <td id="LC121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this Lesser General Public License (also called &quot;this License&quot;).</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="122"></td>
        <td id="LC122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Each licensee is addressed as &quot;you&quot;.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="123"></td>
        <td id="LC123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="124"></td>
        <td id="LC124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  A &quot;library&quot; means a collection of software functions and/or data</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="125"></td>
        <td id="LC125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prepared so as to be conveniently linked with application programs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="126"></td>
        <td id="LC126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(which use some of those functions and data) to form executables.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="127"></td>
        <td id="LC127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="128"></td>
        <td id="LC128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  The &quot;Library&quot;, below, refers to any such software library or work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="129"></td>
        <td id="LC129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which has been distributed under these terms.  A &quot;work based on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="130"></td>
        <td id="LC130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library&quot; means either the Library or any derivative work under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="131"></td>
        <td id="LC131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">copyright law: that is to say, a work containing the Library or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="132"></td>
        <td id="LC132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">portion of it, either verbatim or with modifications and/or translated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="133"></td>
        <td id="LC133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straightforwardly into another language.  (Hereinafter, translation is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="134"></td>
        <td id="LC134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">included without limitation in the term &quot;modification&quot;.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="135"></td>
        <td id="LC135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="136"></td>
        <td id="LC136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  &quot;Source code&quot; for a work means the preferred form of the work for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="137"></td>
        <td id="LC137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">making modifications to it.  For a library, complete source code means</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="138"></td>
        <td id="LC138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the source code for all modules it contains, plus any associated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="139"></td>
        <td id="LC139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interface definition files, plus the scripts used to control compilation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="140"></td>
        <td id="LC140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and installation of the library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="141"></td>
        <td id="LC141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="142"></td>
        <td id="LC142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Activities other than copying, distribution and modification are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="143"></td>
        <td id="LC143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered by this License; they are outside its scope.  The act of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="144"></td>
        <td id="LC144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running a program using the Library is not restricted, and output from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="145"></td>
        <td id="LC145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a program is covered only if its contents constitute a work based</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="146"></td>
        <td id="LC146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the Library (independent of the use of the Library in a tool for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="147"></td>
        <td id="LC147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writing it).  Whether that is true depends on what the Library does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="148"></td>
        <td id="LC148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and what the program that uses the Library does.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="149"></td>
        <td id="LC149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="150"></td>
        <td id="LC150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  1. You may copy and distribute verbatim copies of the Library&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="151"></td>
        <td id="LC151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complete source code as you receive it, in any medium, provided that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="152"></td>
        <td id="LC152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you conspicuously and appropriately publish on each copy an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="153"></td>
        <td id="LC153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appropriate copyright notice and disclaimer of warranty; keep intact</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="154"></td>
        <td id="LC154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the notices that refer to this License and to the absence of any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="155"></td>
        <td id="LC155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warranty; and distribute a copy of this License along with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="156"></td>
        <td id="LC156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="157"></td>
        <td id="LC157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="158"></td>
        <td id="LC158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  You may charge a fee for the physical act of transferring a copy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="159"></td>
        <td id="LC159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and you may at your option offer warranty protection in exchange for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="160"></td>
        <td id="LC160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fee.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="161"></td>
        <td id="LC161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="162"></td>
        <td id="LC162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  2. You may modify your copy or copies of the Library or any portion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="163"></td>
        <td id="LC163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it, thus forming a work based on the Library, and copy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="164"></td>
        <td id="LC164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distribute such modifications or work under the terms of Section 1</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="165"></td>
        <td id="LC165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above, provided that you also meet all of these conditions:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="166"></td>
        <td id="LC166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="167"></td>
        <td id="LC167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a) The modified work must itself be a software library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="168"></td>
        <td id="LC168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="169"></td>
        <td id="LC169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    b) You must cause the files modified to carry prominent notices</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="170"></td>
        <td id="LC170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    stating that you changed the files and the date of any change.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="171"></td>
        <td id="LC171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="172"></td>
        <td id="LC172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    c) You must cause the whole of the work to be licensed at no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="173"></td>
        <td id="LC173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    charge to all third parties under the terms of this License.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="174"></td>
        <td id="LC174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="175"></td>
        <td id="LC175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    d) If a facility in the modified Library refers to a function or a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="176"></td>
        <td id="LC176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    table of data to be supplied by an application program that uses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="177"></td>
        <td id="LC177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the facility, other than as an argument passed when the facility</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="178"></td>
        <td id="LC178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    is invoked, then you must make a good faith effort to ensure that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="179"></td>
        <td id="LC179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    in the event an application does not supply such function or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="180"></td>
        <td id="LC180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    table, the facility still operates, and performs whatever part of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="181"></td>
        <td id="LC181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    its purpose remains meaningful.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="182"></td>
        <td id="LC182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="183"></td>
        <td id="LC183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    (For example, a function in a library to compute square roots has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="184"></td>
        <td id="LC184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a purpose that is entirely well-defined independent of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="185"></td>
        <td id="LC185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    application.  Therefore, Subsection 2d requires that any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="186"></td>
        <td id="LC186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    application-supplied function or table used by this function must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="187"></td>
        <td id="LC187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    be optional: if the application does not supply it, the square</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="188"></td>
        <td id="LC188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    root function must still compute square roots.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="189"></td>
        <td id="LC189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="190"></td>
        <td id="LC190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These requirements apply to the modified work as a whole.  If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="191"></td>
        <td id="LC191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">identifiable sections of that work are not derived from the Library,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="192"></td>
        <td id="LC192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and can be reasonably considered independent and separate works in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="193"></td>
        <td id="LC193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves, then this License, and its terms, do not apply to those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="194"></td>
        <td id="LC194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sections when you distribute them as separate works.  But when you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="195"></td>
        <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distribute the same sections as part of a whole which is a work based</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="196"></td>
        <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the Library, the distribution of the whole must be on the terms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="197"></td>
        <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this License, whose permissions for other licensees extend to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="198"></td>
        <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entire whole, and thus to each and every part regardless of who wrote</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="199"></td>
        <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="200"></td>
        <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="201"></td>
        <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus, it is not the intent of this section to claim rights or contest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="202"></td>
        <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your rights to work written entirely by you; rather, the intent is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="203"></td>
        <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exercise the right to control the distribution of derivative or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="204"></td>
        <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">collective works based on the Library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="205"></td>
        <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="206"></td>
        <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In addition, mere aggregation of another work not based on the Library</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>
        <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the Library (or with a work based on the Library) on a volume of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="208"></td>
        <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a storage or distribution medium does not bring the other work under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="209"></td>
        <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the scope of this License.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="210"></td>
        <td id="LC210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="211"></td>
        <td id="LC211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  3. You may opt to apply the terms of the ordinary GNU General Public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="212"></td>
        <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">License instead of this License to a given copy of the Library.  To do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="213"></td>
        <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, you must alter all the notices that refer to this License, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="214"></td>
        <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they refer to the ordinary GNU General Public License, version 2,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="215"></td>
        <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instead of to this License.  (If a newer version than version 2 of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="216"></td>
        <td id="LC216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ordinary GNU General Public License has appeared, then you can specify</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="217"></td>
        <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that version instead if you wish.)  Do not make any other change in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these notices.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="219"></td>
        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="220"></td>
        <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Once this change is made in a given copy, it is irreversible for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="221"></td>
        <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that copy, so the ordinary GNU General Public License applies to all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="222"></td>
        <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subsequent copies and derivative works made from that copy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="223"></td>
        <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="224"></td>
        <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  This option is useful when you wish to copy part of the code of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="225"></td>
        <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Library into a program that is not a library.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="226"></td>
        <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="227"></td>
        <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  4. You may copy and distribute the Library (or a portion or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="228"></td>
        <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">derivative of it, under Section 2) in object code or executable form</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="229"></td>
        <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the terms of Sections 1 and 2 above provided that you accompany</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="230"></td>
        <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it with the complete corresponding machine-readable source code, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="231"></td>
        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">must be distributed under the terms of Sections 1 and 2 above on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="232"></td>
        <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">medium customarily used for software interchange.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="233"></td>
        <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="234"></td>
        <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  If distribution of object code is made by offering access to copy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="235"></td>
        <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from a designated place, then offering equivalent access to copy the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="236"></td>
        <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">source code from the same place satisfies the requirement to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="237"></td>
        <td id="LC237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distribute the source code, even though third parties are not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="238"></td>
        <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compelled to copy the source along with the object code.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="239"></td>
        <td id="LC239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="240"></td>
        <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  5. A program that contains no derivative of any portion of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="241"></td>
        <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library, but is designed to work with the Library by being compiled or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>
        <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linked with it, is called a &quot;work that uses the Library&quot;.  Such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>
        <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work, in isolation, is not a derivative work of the Library, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="244"></td>
        <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore falls outside the scope of this License.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="245"></td>
        <td id="LC245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="246"></td>
        <td id="LC246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  However, linking a &quot;work that uses the Library&quot; with the Library</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="247"></td>
        <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creates an executable that is a derivative of the Library (because it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="248"></td>
        <td id="LC248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contains portions of the Library), rather than a &quot;work that uses the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="249"></td>
        <td id="LC249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">library&quot;.  The executable is therefore covered by this License.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="250"></td>
        <td id="LC250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section 6 states terms for distribution of such executables.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="251"></td>
        <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="252"></td>
        <td id="LC252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  When a &quot;work that uses the Library&quot; uses material from a header file</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="253"></td>
        <td id="LC253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that is part of the Library, the object code for the work may be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="254"></td>
        <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">derivative work of the Library even though the source code is not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="255"></td>
        <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Whether this is true is especially significant if the work can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="256"></td>
        <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linked without the Library, or if the work is itself a library.  The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="257"></td>
        <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threshold for this to be true is not precisely defined by law.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="258"></td>
        <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="259"></td>
        <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  If such an object file uses only numerical parameters, data</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="260"></td>
        <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">structure layouts and accessors, and small macros and small inline</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="261"></td>
        <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">functions (ten lines or less in length), then the use of the object</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="262"></td>
        <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">file is unrestricted, regardless of whether it is legally a derivative</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="263"></td>
        <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work.  (Executables containing this object code plus portions of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="264"></td>
        <td id="LC264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library will still fall under Section 6.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="265"></td>
        <td id="LC265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="266"></td>
        <td id="LC266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  Otherwise, if the work is a derivative of the Library, you may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="267"></td>
        <td id="LC267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distribute the object code for the work under the terms of Section 6.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="268"></td>
        <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Any executables containing that work also fall under Section 6,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="269"></td>
        <td id="LC269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether or not they are linked directly with the Library itself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="270"></td>
        <td id="LC270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="271"></td>
        <td id="LC271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  6. As an exception to the Sections above, you may also combine or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="272"></td>
        <td id="LC272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">link a &quot;work that uses the Library&quot; with the Library to produce a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="273"></td>
        <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work containing portions of the Library, and distribute that work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="274"></td>
        <td id="LC274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under terms of your choice, provided that the terms permit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="275"></td>
        <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">modification of the work for the customer&#39;s own use and reverse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="276"></td>
        <td id="LC276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engineering for debugging such modifications.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="277"></td>
        <td id="LC277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="278"></td>
        <td id="LC278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  You must give prominent notice with each copy of the work that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="279"></td>
        <td id="LC279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library is used in it and that the Library and its use are covered by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="280"></td>
        <td id="LC280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this License.  You must supply a copy of this License.  If the work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="281"></td>
        <td id="LC281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">during execution displays copyright notices, you must include the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="282"></td>
        <td id="LC282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">copyright notice for the Library among them, as well as a reference</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="283"></td>
        <td id="LC283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">directing the user to the copy of this License.  Also, you must do one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="284"></td>
        <td id="LC284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of these things:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="285"></td>
        <td id="LC285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="286"></td>
        <td id="LC286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    a) Accompany the work with the complete corresponding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="287"></td>
        <td id="LC287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    machine-readable source code for the Library including whatever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="288"></td>
        <td id="LC288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    changes were used in the work (which must be distributed under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="289"></td>
        <td id="LC289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Sections 1 and 2 above); and, if the work is an executable linked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="290"></td>
        <td id="LC290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    with the Library, with the complete machine-readable &quot;work that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="291"></td>
        <td id="LC291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    uses the Library&quot;, as object code and/or source code, so that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="292"></td>
        <td id="LC292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    user can modify the Library and then relink to produce a modified</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="293"></td>
        <td id="LC293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    executable containing the modified Library.  (It is understood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="294"></td>
        <td id="LC294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    that the user who changes the contents of definitions files in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="295"></td>
        <td id="LC295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Library will not necessarily be able to recompile the application</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="296"></td>
        <td id="LC296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    to use the modified definitions.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="297"></td>
        <td id="LC297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="298"></td>
        <td id="LC298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    b) Use a suitable shared library mechanism for linking with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="299"></td>
        <td id="LC299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Library.  A suitable mechanism is one that (1) uses at run time a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="300"></td>
        <td id="LC300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    copy of the library already present on the user&#39;s computer system,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="301"></td>
        <td id="LC301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    rather than copying library functions into the executable, and (2)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="302"></td>
        <td id="LC302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    will operate properly with a modified version of the library, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="303"></td>
        <td id="LC303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the user installs one, as long as the modified version is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="304"></td>
        <td id="LC304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    interface-compatible with the version that the work was made with.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="305"></td>
        <td id="LC305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="306"></td>
        <td id="LC306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    c) Accompany the work with a written offer, valid for at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="307"></td>
        <td id="LC307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    least three years, to give the same user the materials</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="308"></td>
        <td id="LC308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    specified in Subsection 6a, above, for a charge no more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="309"></td>
        <td id="LC309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    than the cost of performing this distribution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="310"></td>
        <td id="LC310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="311"></td>
        <td id="LC311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    d) If distribution of the work is made by offering access to copy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="312"></td>
        <td id="LC312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    from a designated place, offer equivalent access to copy the above</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="313"></td>
        <td id="LC313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    specified materials from the same place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="314"></td>
        <td id="LC314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="315"></td>
        <td id="LC315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    e) Verify that the user has already received a copy of these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="316"></td>
        <td id="LC316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    materials or that you have already sent this user a copy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="317"></td>
        <td id="LC317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="318"></td>
        <td id="LC318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">  For an executable, the required form of the &quot;work that uses the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="319"></td>
        <td id="LC319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Library&quot; must include any data and utility programs needed for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="320"></td>
        <td id="LC320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reproducing the executable from it.  However, as a special exception,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="321"></td>
        <td id="LC321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the materials to be distributed need not include anything that is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="322"></td>
        <td id="LC322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">normally distributed (in either source or binary form) with the major</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="323"></td>
        <td id="LC323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">components (compiler, kernel, and so on) of the operating system on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="324"></td>
        <td id="LC324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the executable runs, unless that component itself accompanies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="325"></td>
        <td id="LC325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the executable.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="326"></td>
        <td id="LC326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
